short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store & Manage multiple cookie profiles per domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cookie Profile Switcher allows you to easily manage multiple cookie sessions for all of your websites! No more logging out & logging in, just to switch your user profile. This is a MUST have for people who manage multiple social media profiles, emails or eCommerce accounts. Simply create a new profile in the extension, login to your user account, then you can switch between your profiles with ease.
